name: sunshade
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
an object similar to an umbrella that you carry to protect yourself from light from the sun
TimArbaev/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
(US also umbrella) a larger folding frame of this type that you put into the ground to form an area that is sheltered from the light of the sun
Pierre-Yves Babelon/Moment/GettyImages
US an
awning
AdrianHancu/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
